       <div id="wrapbox16650359">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16650359">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16650359">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16650359">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:486px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16649316">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16649316">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16649316">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Marketing Histories in Reference Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16649316">
          <div id="boxatt16649316" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22656245">
              Advertising Age Encyclopedia of Advertising
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Call # 659.103 A244a (B level), or ON RESERVE for BUS 239 at Trexler Library front desk.)
               <br />
               Hundreds of major advertising campaigns.
               <br />
               <a href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/cannon/advertising_age_index_one.pdf">
                Index A-J
               </a>
               .
               <a href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/cannon/advertising_age_index_two.pdf">
                Index J-Z
               </a>
               .
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19672807">
              Encyclopedia of Consumer Brands
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Call #  658.8343 E56o (B level), or ON RESERVE for BUS 239 at Trexler Library front desk.)
               <br />
               History of major name brands worldwide and their associated campaigns.
               <br />
               <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/library/guides/libinst/abe/encyclopediaconsumerbrands.pdf">
                Index
               </a>
               .
               <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/library/guides/libinst/abe/consumerbrands.pdf">
                List by industry
               </a>
               .
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22966620">
              <a id="link_22966620" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;res_id=info%3Asid%2Fgale%3AGVRL&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi%2Ffmt:kev:mtx:journal&amp;rft.isbn=9781558628540&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:oclc.org:mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22966620,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22966620}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Global Brands
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Contains 270 entries, written in case-study style, that highlight interesting details including how a product originated and was first marketed, how it developed commercially and how it fares today compared with its competitors and its own past history. Included are anecdotes pertaining to the famous, or infamous, marketing strategies and advertising campaigns that managed to capture the sometimes jaded viewers' attention
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19673731">
              Encyclopedia of Major Marketing Campaigns
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Call # 659.1 E56o (B level), or ON RESERVE for BUS 239 at Trexler Library front desk.)
               <br />
               History of major name brands worldwide and their associated campaigns.
               <br />
               Index
               <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/library/guides/libinst/abe/majormktgcampvol1.pdf">
                vol. 1
               </a>
               and
               <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/library/guides/libinst/abe/majormktgcampvol2.pdf">
                vol. 2
               </a>
               .
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23716128">
              <a id="link_23716128" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://go.galegroup.com/ps/i.do?id=GALE%7C9781414406077&amp;v=2.1&amp;u=mul_coll&amp;it=etoc&amp;p=GVRL&amp;sw=w" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23716128,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23716128}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Major Marketing Campaigns vol. 2
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               History of major name brands worldwide and their associated campaigns.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19720906">
              <a id="link_19720906" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/5XFA" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19720906,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19720906}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Major Marketing Strategies
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available online. This volume is a continuation of the Encyclopedia of Major Marketing Campaigns.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16691885">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16691885">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16691885">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           News of Recent Marketing Ventures
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16691885">
          <div id="boxatt16691885" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19721252">
              <a id="link_19721252" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19721252,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19721252}); ">
               Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. An "aggregator database" containing the full text of trade journals and other business periodicals. Known for its subject indexing. Strong on information about both industries and companies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25170596">
              <a id="link_25170596" href="http://search.proquest.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/publication/10482" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25170596,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25170596}); ">
               Wall Street Journal
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. The "paper of record" of the business world. Proquest version contains full text archive 1984-today. No charts or graphs
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16691549">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16691549">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16691549">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Company Histories
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16691549">
          <div id="boxatt16691549" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link21719791">
              <a id="link_21719791" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://go.galegroup.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/ps/aboutSeries.do?inPS=true&amp;prodId=GVRL&amp;userGroupName=mul_coll&amp;seriesId=0IAD" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21719791,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21719775}); ">
               International Directory of Company Histories
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A reliable source of historical information for many companies: American and foreign, private and public, past and present-day.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox22032734">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22032734">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22032734">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Identifying the Parent Company
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22032734">
          <div id="boxatt22032734" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25491268">
              <a id="link_25491268" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25491268,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016760}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25491270">
              <a id="link_25491270" href="http://www.lexisnexis.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/hottopics/lnacademic/?verb=sr&amp;csi=149023" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25491270,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25485401}); ">
               LexisNexis Corporate Affiliations
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Gives the corporate hierarchy from parents through subsidiaries. A good way to get geographical distribution as well.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16651984">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16651984">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16651984">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Market Share
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16651984">
          <div id="boxatt16651984" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19675948">
              Market Share Reporter
              <div class="linkdesc">
               (Call# 338.74 M345s (B level), or ON RESERVE for BUS 239 at the Trexler Library front desk. )
               <br />
               A library reference book. Looks at market share within an industry, showing what companies and products hold the largest share.
               <br />
               <a href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/cannon/drpepper2015.pdf">
                Sample page beverages
               </a>
               .
               <a href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/cannon/trains.pdf">
                Sample page trains
               </a>
               .
               <br />
               <br />
               <br />
               <br />
               <a href="http://sal.muhlenberg.edu/library/guides/libinst/abe/marketsharereporter2014.pdf">
                2014 index (by brand)
               </a>
               .
               <br />
               <br />
               <a href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/cannon/brandsindex.pdf">
                2015 index (by brand)
               </a>
               .
               <br />
               <br />
               <a href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/cannon/2016_brands.pdf ">
                2016 index (by brand)
               </a>
               .
               <br />
               <br />
               <br />
               <a href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/cannon/companyMS2014.pdf">
                2014 index (by company name)
               </a>
               .
               <br />
               <br />
               <a href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/cannon/companyindex.pdf">
                2015 index (by company name)
               </a>
               .
               <br />
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox22033964">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22033964">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22033964">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Company Data
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22033964">
          <div id="boxatt22033964" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25492126">
              <a id="link_25492126" href="http://web.ebscohost.com/ehost/search/advanced?sid=d101bf20-4097-4449-8df3-e42137731abc%40sessionmgr4003&amp;vid=1&amp;hid=4201" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492126,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19993214}); ">
               MarketLine Company Profiles via Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. 30-50 page reports describing 10,000 public and private companies worldwide, with a history of the company plus SWOT analysis. Information is based on primary research with industry panels and consumers. MarketLine gathers information on market segmentation, market growth and pricing, competitors and products, then interprets this data in company profiles. To access, go into Busines Source Elite and then click on the Company Profiles tab at the top of the screen.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492130">
              <a id="link_25492130" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492130,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. An alternative to ValueLine for finding authoritative investor information about companies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492133">
              <a id="link_25492133" href="http://www.reuters.com/finance/stocks/lookup?" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492133,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19994041}); ">
               Reuters
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search for a publicly-traded company by ticker or company name, then click on "financials" to see both company and industry ratios.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492135">
              <a id="link_25492135" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www3.valueline.com/is/5000index.aspx" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492135,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730980}); ">
               ValueLine
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides information on U.S. companies that sell stock. Information includes graphs, charts, ratings, and peer group analysis.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox22033971">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22033971">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22033971">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Consumer Information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22033971">
          <div id="boxatt22033971" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25492138">
              <a id="link_25492138" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.portal.euromonitor.com/portal/server.pt" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492138,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730971}); ">
               Passport Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Passport Reference, published by Euromonitor, provides comparable international business intelligence on countries, consumers and industries. It offers access to more than 1 million country, market and lifestyle statistics; 4,500 market research reports (global reports, country reports, industry reports, company reports and lifestyle reports); 205 country profiles: company market share and brand share rankings; 35,000 business information sources.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492140">
              <a id="link_25492140" href="https://oneview.simmonsresearch.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492140,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 17494421}); ">
               Simmons National Consumer Survey (Oneview)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Consumer segmentation for the continental U.S., adults. Password required for use. Contact kcannon@muhlenberg.edu.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:243px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4534553" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox22032753">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22032753">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22032753">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16865950">
          <div id="boxatt16865950" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19903774">
              <a id="link_19903774" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19903774,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19903774}); ">
               Trexler Library Citation Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief, easy-to-use guides to the 3 most used citation styles: APA, Chicago (Turabian), MLA.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19903775">
              <a id="link_19903775" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19903775,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Marketing', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19903775}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free citation tool. Does the citing for you! Loved by librarians, professors, and students alike.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
